title: ALWSL (arch on bash on Windows) now sponsored by Fastly
author: overtarn
content: readme.md project provides easy to install custom, minimal, arch linux distribution the wsl host. you to try right , clone run alwsl batch file a non-admin command prompt.update mar 2017 are happy announce fastly a sponsor a reliable global delivery alwsl root images future updates. fastly commited monthly four-figure credit the alwsl project will help alwsl's transition a version later month.checkout fastly's open-source efforts here.
